CustomField.description: Number of days the quote has been open.
CustomField.formula: if(OR(ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Status__c ,"Draft" ),ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Status__c ,"In Review"),ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Status__c , "Approved"), ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Status__c , "Presented")),Round(NOW() - CreatedDate,0) ,null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days the quote has been open.
CustomField.label: Days Quote Open
